metric_data.name: Contextual Relevancy
metric_data.reason: The score is 0.77 because the irrelevancy notes state that lines like 'Mr. Starbuck; wilt thou not chase the white whale?' and 'Hast seen the White Whale?' reference the White Whale without identifying the obsessed captain, yet the relevant statements—'That captain was Ahab.', 'Captain Ahab wants to chase the white whale.', and 'Captain Ahab is the captain mentioned in the context.'—confirm the captain obsessed with hunting the white whale is Ahab.
